it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client

Class DieColorMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
      • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.ClientMessage
        • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.client.DieColorMessage

  • public class DieColorMessage
extends ClientMessage
    Notifies the player of the color of the die extracted from the bag after using tool card 11.

    Contains everything needed to be transformed into a Json string to be sent across the network as a source of information.
